name: trello_add_comment
description: Add a comment to a Trello card.

steps.code: const resp = await fetch('/1/cards/{{card_id}}/actions/comments?text=' + encodeURIComponent(`{{comment}}`), { method: 'POST', credentials: 'same-origin' }); if (!resp.ok) { const err = await resp.text(); throw new Error('Comment failed: ' + resp.status + ' ' + err); } const result = await resp.json(); return { success: true, card_id: '{{card_id}}', comment_id: result.id, author: result.memberCreator?.fullName || '' }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Add comment via Trello API
